content:
Salesforce Knowledge is available in the Unlimited Edition with Service Cloud. Salesforce Knowledge is also available for an additional cost in Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions.

To share article contents in the case feed:

* Edit on Case permission
* Read on Knowledge permission
* Allow user to share internal knowledge articles externally

The Knowledge component must be available in your Service Console.

From the Knowledge component or articles related list, select Attach and share article. Click Share. Email is the default action, but you can switch to Social or Experience Cloud site action in the case feed before inserting the article.
title: Sharing Knowledge Articles in Salesforce Classic
